I had to leave a review for these bagpacks, they’re one of the best purchases I’ve made in Amazon! Great quality, plenty of space, plenty of compartments to put small stuff, also a small baggie included for makeup or cables, etc. I love how comfortable the shoulder straps are, even when I’m carrying a lot, the bag doesn’t feel heavy.  I highly recommend it if you’re looking for a work or hiking bagpack that is spacious and comfortable at the same time. The only flaw is the charging port, its starting to be faulty in my white bag so I’m not sure how long it’ll last (thus minus one star), but magnets at the front are strong and again, shoulder straps are pretty comfortable. It’s also waterproof! Great value for your money!

I will use it as my carry-all, as my purse type stuff and my writing and art stuff. I can wear on my back when needed (like when I ride the bus).

评论概述: Wrong item, but cute I suppose
评论详情: This isn't my first time with a Lovevook backpack so I do love the brand, I just wanted an upgrade. Something with a cleaner look as I've outgrew my old one. I had ordered the model showed in picture in the color beige-brown, size 15. However, upon further discovery once I received my item, the title of the item had not matched the cart description at all and I was sent an entirely different backpack (design and all) in size 17. No powerbank port and no pencil case included as promised. This was a huge disappointment and I was about to return the item, but with the holidays and just because the bag ended up looking cute either way, I think I'll keep it. The extra space will probably do me some good too as a college student, so I suppose this wasn't too bad. They did get the beige-brown color part right so I suppose congratulations is in order. However, if I was to return this and order a new one, I won't see the item until at least January when school have already restart, so I don't know. Perhaps I'll change my mind later, but I do just want to put this out there. I tried checking size 15 in all the other colors too but same thing in that item title name does not match cart description, and I'm not sure if ordering will result in this same mishap.  TLDR: The bag is cute either way. I don't miss the powerbank too much as I never used that feature anyway in my old backpack but man I do wish I did receive that pencil case. Deciding to keep FOR NOW, but I am an indecisive person. Just overall a little confused.
Bought as Christmas gift! Person very happy with it and seems to be of good quality!

I got this because I visit my medium distance partner weekly and it's wonderful.  It has plenty of pockets, a spot that holds my laptop, and it fits comfortably on my back. It is spacious enough for clothes, my laptop, chargers, gaming headset, toiletries, and even water bottles on each side of it.  It deals with constant wear and tear and I've had it a few months with no issues. I plan on getting a smaller one to use as a carry on when I travel by plane if possible.  Also, the cord it has so you can charge a device that is in the bag from outside the bag/vice versa is lovely.

Wife uses this as a work bag and can fit everything she needs in it for the day easy. She has used it almost everyday since we have got it and have never had an issue with it at all. The build is super durable and she will keep using it till it breaks down in her. I have also used it to fit a PS5 and all the accessories I wanted to bring with me! Would recommend to anyone looking for a quality backpack!

Pros: Love all the pockets and pouches, roomy, multi purpose uses Cons: heavy empty, not great for travel when weight is a factor, zipper broke after two trips.
I got this backpack so I would quit shoving work papers in my purse. There are so many pockets and roomy for my daily life. Im so glad I got this backpack.
This bag was bigger than expected and I love it for work. I can fit everything i need for the day. Will buy more as gifts. The bags are so nice!

I was looking for something that I could take on my trip to Italy that would be stylish but allow me to carry everything I needed with me in a day. This has a great storage capacity, with multiple pockets for me to fit everything I needed in and the pockets on the side fit my 32 oz Owala water bottle perfectly. The durability kept up during my trip and since, though the only reason o give this 4 stars instead of 5 is because one of the leather fake buckles seems to be tearing a little even though I didn’t mess with it much. It rained a few times on our trip and nothing inside got wet which was nice for unpredictable weather. The weight and versatility was perfect for the 9+ miles we walked every day for 10 days straight. I never ended up using the charging port since I packed a different charging pack, but the quality of the cord seemed nice and sturdy. I recommended highly for a stylish look for travel and every day use.
Great backpack/handbag with a lot of space and compartments

评论详情: I love it so much. It's really good quality and even better than my old herschel bag. It doesn't have a weird smell, and it's really comfortable to wear. The one thing is that the straps on the backpack seem a bit loose and it came undone/loose a few times, but I have some clips that I can secure it with so it's not a big deal.

Bought this bag a month ago to use day-to-day for work. I commute everyday to the city and it sturdy and can pack a lot of items. The only thing I would say if you pack to the top you might have some trouble closing it. Also my only complaint in the details it says “waterproof” and I can verify that it is indeed not. I was caught in a rainstorm and some water leaked into the bags where my laptop was placed and it got some water on it luckily no damage. But if you are looking for that detail might want to double think it or be sure to carry an umbrella at all times just in case. Otherwise a great bag and looks amazing too!
